title: Junjou→←Haraguro Kareshi
sinopse:
Yuuki is a cute boy, who is Akane's childhood friend. Akane starts to fall in love with a guy and she confides in Yuuki. But Yuuki would not have it, as he kisses Akane. For the first time, Akane gets to see the real Yuuki?!

(Source: MU)

Included one-shots: Ookami-kun ni Himitsu wo Ageru♡, Sawatte! Junjou Lingerie, Ookami Shounen to Meguru Hibi.
